justification: “We administered two trait anxiety scales to capture its multidimensionality: State-Trait Anxiety Inventory trait scale (STAI-T …).  STAI-T is the most widely used trait anxiety measure…”

measured_by: State-Trait Inventory for Cognitive and Somatic Anxiety – Trait scale (STICSA-T)
justification: “We administered two trait anxiety scales … State-Trait Inventory for Cognitive and Somatic Anxiety trait scale (STICSA-T …).”
“These effects were robust … remaining significant when trait somatic anxiety was quantified by raw STICSA-T somatic subscale score (SI Table 6).”
